name: Pottery Run
description:
The volcano on your island is bursting and you have to save your pots from certain doom!
Can you get the best score and help this islander preserve his collection?

This game started as a Global Game Jam game made in 2019. This version was created in Game Maker, but 2 of the original team ported it to Unity for release.

Huge shout out to Pat Cleaver for creating all original music and sound effects!

If you find any bugs, please comment so we can take a look at it.
